name: A frostburned cold metal locket
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
